name: Plant Fibre Lash Collection
about: What it is: A pair of beginner-friendly, natural-looking false lashes that can be reused at least 20 times...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Plant Fibre lashes are handmade with hemp-derived fibres on a full length black band for fluffy, natural-looking and lightweight comfort.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.How to Apply with Velour Lash Adhesive:.-Measure and trim the lash band to fit your natural lash line..-Apply a thin layer of Lash Adhesive to the band and wait 30 seconds..-Place the lash along your lash line and adjust as necessary...How to Apply with Velour Lash & Go Eyeliner (sold separately):.-Measure and trim the lash band to fit your natural lash line..-Starting with one eye, apply Lash & Go Eyeliner (sold separately) from inner to outer corner of your lash line..-Place the lash along your lash line when eyeliner is still wet. ..Recycling Instructions:.-Remove the sleeve from the box and take the lash tray out before recycling all pieces.

shades.shade_descriptor: natural-looking and lightweight, the perfect everyday lash
wispy and full volume for a fresh-faced look
ultra-wispy and gradually flared to create a sultry look
ulta-natural volume, fluttery wing-like look, hemp-derived fibers
natural, round flirty lash, hemp-derived fibers

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, but not as natural as u201cadvertised.u201d I am personally not a fan of super full looking lashes, so I thought these looked nice for occasions. However, they are much fuller than what the picture shows them as. So if you prefer more natural looking sets I would say these are not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a cute pair of lashes!! My go-tos ALWAYS!! Theyu2019re so comfy & I barely feel them! I love the way they pull my glam together! Definitely will be purchasing again!
